module.name: FreePBX Framework
module.changelog: *2.11.0.38* #7251 *2.11.0.37* FREEPBX-7344 FreePBX generated CSS link for module css files is wrong *2.11.0.35* Fix issue with str_replacing htdocs in libfreepbx.install.php *2.11.0.31* Only define DB classes one time *2.11.0.30* Update framework DB to have helper functions for functions that mysqli needs *2.11.0.29* Revert Use mysqli extension for database access, if available. *2.11.0.28* #7141 Use mysqli extension for database access, if available. *2.11.0.27* Change security shield functionality, add advanced setting to disable nightly update checking *2.11.0.26* Make the chown's smarter. *2.11.0.24* Add japanese language support *2.11.0.23* #7134 *2.11.0.22* #7130 *2.11.0.21* #7123 SECURITY ISSUE introduced in 2.9 *2.11.0.18* #6471 Allow better voicemail passwords *2.11.0.17* Set CustomPresence on dynamic hints, when available. *2.11.0.16* Small variable Fix to the last tarball *2.11.0.15* Make the framework tarball smaller *2.11.0.14* Fix issue where javascript errors broke the GUI *2.11.0.13* Fix page_body id to reflect footer changes and Fix ARI Link on the Login page *2.11.0.12* Restful Library Addition, New Distro Versioning Support *2.11.0.11* #6673, #6682, #6683 #6721 *2.11.0.10* #6656 *2.11.0.9* another typo for NOTIFICATION_IGNORE, assure module callbacks are seen in module_admin *2.11.0.8* fix typo in NOTIFICATION_IGNORE format *2.11.0.7* #6651 and allow file handler to use restrictmods *2.11.0.6* need to commit the new setting *2.11.0.5* make sure amp_conf setup right even if class isn't created with create *2.11.0.4* minor tweak in NOTIFICAION_IGNORE format *2.11.0.3* r15801, r15803, r15804, r15805, r15806 misc internal improvements *2.11.0.2* #6603, misc *2.11.0.1* update to send base version properly *2.11.0.0* 2.11.0 final *2.11.0.0rc1.8* #6547, #6541, #6553, #6550 *2.11.0.0rc1.7* #6547, #6527, #6546, #5270, #6541 *2.11.0.0rc1.6* Added mysql charset to asterisk dialplan function *2.11.0.0rc1.5* #6527, when creating a top level single category button use the module name not the category name, change wording on beta view *2.11.0.0rc1.4* re #6529 - *2.11.0.0rc1.3* #6506, #6507, #6518, fix PHP 5.3 ananoymous function requirement, misc *2.11.0.0rc1.2* broke some advanced settings fixed now *2.11.0.0rc1.1* update pbxlib.js *2.11.0.0rc1.0* #6488, res_odbc.conf, rtp.conf migrations, *2.11.0.0beta2.9* Fixes #6472, destination popovers not working *2.11.0.0beta2.8* #6455 have amportal remove dangling symlinks *2.11.0.0beta2.7* #6272, #6453, better splicing granularity, beta module page support *2.11.0.0beta2.6* #6303, #6387, #6384, jQuery 1.7 deprecation changes, extensions class fixes, obe validation, PIAF index.php fix *2.11.0.0beta2.5* Update compressed libpbx *2.11.0.0beta2.4* #6380 Fixes login issue on non-chrome browsers. Fixes extmap shown *2.11.0.0beta2.3* #5829, #6271, #6237, 6272, #6300, #6320, #6049, #6351, #6349 *2.11.0.0beta2.2* #5412, #6159, #5842 *2.11.0.0beta2.1* remove error in sql install template breaking new installs, upgrades ok *2.11.0.0beta2.0* beta2 release *2.11.0.0beta1.5* #5842, #6147, #6154 *2.11.0.0beta1.4* #6060, #5412, #6063, #6079, other changes *2.11.0.0beta1.3* Fix issue with Advanced Settings being set to hidden in error *2.11.0.0beta1.2* #6051, #6055, #6057 *2.11.0.0beta1.1* #6051 destination popOvers *2.11.0.0beta1.0* #5969, #5933, #5989, #6002, #6010, #6011, #6013, #6023, #6034, #6030, #6036 *2.10.1.11* Fix duplication in xml *2.10.1.12* Repackage and fixes for new system *2.10.1.10* #6651 and related astmanger change *2.10.1.9* fix new footer *2.10.1.8* Packaging of ver 2.10.1.8 *2.10.1.7* Packaging of ver 2.10.1.7 *2.10.1.6* update copyright notice *2.10.1.5* rnav visual fix; upstream changes *2.10.1.4* #5842, #6147, #6154 *2.10.1.3* #5989, #6030 *2.10.1.2* #5933, #5969 *2.10.1.1* remove some code checked in error not used *2.10.1.0* #5874, #5833, #5646, #5879, #5839, *2.10.0.8* #5851 *2.10.0.7* #5815 *2.10.0.6* #5812 *2.10.0.5* #5716, #5763, #5742, #5743, #5533, #5692 *2.10.0.4* re #5755 - assorted bug fixes *2.10.0.3* downstream updates *2.10.0.2* #5492, #5565, #5662, #5678 *2.10.0.1* #5492, #5443, #5646, #5565 *2.10.0.0* bump to final, tooltip updates *2.10.0rc1.7* #5627, #5628 *2.10.0rc1.6* #5619 again, typo *2.10.0rc1.5* amportal chown corrections from last checkin *2.10.0rc1.4* #5619, #5615, some amportal chown tuning *2.10.0rc1.3* #5528, #5391, #5260, #5148, colapsible gui eleent sections *2.10.0rc1.2* #5585 SECURITY ISSUE introduced in 2.10.0rc1.2 previous version *2.10.0rc1.1* #4909, #5117, #5545, #5565 menu/CSS fixes, default language improvements *2.10.0rc1.0* add backup repo, misc, bump release candidate *2.10.0beta3.6* #5513 and one more syntax issue *2.10.0beta3.5* #5513 check for setting first *2.10.0beta3.4* #5513, better zend detecetion, cdr migration bug check *2.10.0beta3.3* add some error checking on migration script *2.10.0beta3.2* migrates cdr table adding did field *2.10.0beta3.1* migrates cdr table adding recordingfile field *2.10.0beta3.0* beta3 bump, misc tweaks *2.10.0beta2.8* #5465, #5475, #5476, #5480, adds .htaccess to address some potential security vulnerabilities *2.10.0beta2.7* #5465 *2.10.0beta2.6* #5342, #5461, #5451, #5463, #5442, gui changes, manager library enhancements, *2.10.0beta2.5* version bump, see trac for more info *2.10.0beta2.4* #5122, #5443, #5451, #5450 *2.10.0beta2.3* revert r12651 *2.10.0beta2.2* module admin depency check changes *2.10.0beta2.1* migration script bug fix *2.10.0beta2.0* move FOP to module, add hook ability to freepbx_engine (amportal), remove gzip handling preventing caching, various bug fixes *2.10.0beta1.1* #5375, #5341, #5375, #5390, more on $5342, adds back freepbx_menu.conf to customize menu bar and content *2.10.0beta1.0* beta1 release, see svn log *2.9.0.7* #5209, #5217, #5221, #5212, #5211, #5140, #5216 *2.9.0.6* #5194 *2.9.0.5* #5183 *2.9.0.4* #5138 *2.9.0.3* #5160 *2.9.0.2* #5122 *2.9.0.1* #5027 module.description: This module provides a facility to install bug fixes to the framework code that is not otherwise housed in a module
